headline: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) Focused on Innovation and Efficiency to Accelerate Growth
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is one of the best defensive stocks to buy, according to Steve Cohen. On September 4, at the Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference 2025, the company reiterated its commitment to leveraging innovation and efficiency to drive future growth. As the global market growth is expected to stabilize […]
